page.title: 02TRANSPORT IN TICKHILL
page.content: Tickhill has a reliable{bus}service. Buses run from Worksop to Doncaster via Tickhill.They run approximatly every 30 minutes.The fare from Tickhill to Doncaster is 20p for adults,and 4p for children.Buses also run from Bawtry to Sheffield via Tickhill.The fare from Tickhill to Sheffield is 25p for adults, and 4p for children.Tickhill has 2 private bus companies:Morbey's,which has 6 coaches and 1 mini-bus,and Tickhill Mini-Coaches,which has 3 coaches. There is also a taxi service,Tickhill Cabs.Many older children have bicycles so they can{travel}to nearby towns and villages independantly.
